content: गांधर्व {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (र्वी) [गंधर्वस्येदम्-अण्] Relating to the Gandharvas. --र्वः {@--1@} A singer, celestial chorister. {@--2@} One of the eight forms of marriage; गांधर्वः समयान्मिथः <ls>Y. 1. 61</ls>; (for explanation, see गंधर्वविवाह). {@--3@} A subordinate Veda treating of music attached to the Sāmaveda; see उपवेद. {@--4@} A horse. --र्वं The art of the Gandharvas; {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} music, singing; कापि वेला चारुदत्तस्य गांधर्वं श्रोतुं गतस्य <ls>Mk. 3.</ls> --र्वी {@--1@} Speech. {@--2@} An epithet of Durgā.
